verses.roman:
ei-mata saba līlā--yena gaṅgā-dhāra
se-se līlā prakaṭa kare vrajendra-kumāra

synonyms: ei-mata—in this way; saba līlā—all pastimes; yena—like; gaṅgā-dhāra—the flowing of the water of the Ganges; se-se—those; līlā—pastimes; prakaṭa kare—demonstrates; vrajendra-kumāra—the son of Mahārāja Nanda.
translation: "Thus the Lord's pastimes are like flowing Ganges water. In this way all the pastimes are manifested by the son of Nanda Mahārāja.
